paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant identified in the study, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Only four families consented to receiving these results, with one known pathogenic variant in BRCA2 identified in Family 13 (NM_007294.4: c.181 T > C; p.Cys61Gly) (ClinVar VCV000017661.55).

variants.additional_notes: Family members have received follow-up genetic counseling, and further members were offered testing and were/will be enrolled in appropriate cancer surveillance programs.
key_quotes: Only four families consented to receiving these results, with one known pathogenic variant in BRCA2 identified in Family 13 (NM_007294.4: c.181 T > C; p.Cys61Gly) (ClinVar VCV000017661.55).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
